title: Flea Market Find: T206 Paddy Livingstone Philadelphia, PFG $SOLD

posts.post_title: Flea Market Find: T206 Paddy Livingstone Philadelphia, PFG $SOLD
posts.post_content:
No creases but tape stain front and back, not a bad "low" grade card at all.  $SOLD  

[IMG]http://farm2.staticflickr.com/1802/41962570605_94eae701d5_b.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://farm2.staticflickr.com/1826/42863022251_e8d055ecc2_b.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take it if still available.  Message me your information.

Thanks!
